<<<<<<< HEAD
A new book containing sundry set-forms of [p]rayers, thanksgivings and graces [c]omposed chiefly for the benefit of children and youth : [bu]t may be useful to all such as are destitute of better helps, to further them in their godly practices. Killiray, Matthew.
The first edition.
[2], 22 p.
[P]rinted for William Thackeray ..., London : 1673.
Attributed to Matthew Killiray by Wing (2nd. ed.) Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, cropped and defaced, with loss of print; bracketed material lost in binding. Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
=======
A new book containing sundry set-forms of [p]rayers, thanksgivings and graces [c]omposed chiefly for the benefit of children and youth : [bu]t may be useful to all such as are destitute of better helps, to further them in their godly practices. Killiray, Matthew.
The first edition.
[2], 22 p.
[P]rinted for William Thackeray ..., London : 1673.
Attributed to Matthew Killiray by Wing (2nd. ed.) Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, cropped and defaced, with loss of print; bracketed material lost in binding. Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
